predicate.note: Frames file for 'violate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. No comparison.

roleset.name: break some rule

example.name: they're all like this, basically
example.text: Gulf Power had been under investigation for *trace* violating the Utility Holding Company Act, which prohibits public utilities from making political contributions.
example.arg: the Utility Holding Company Act, which prohibits public utilities from making political contributions

roleset.note: Sometimes the 'rule' is hidden within another entity, such as "John violated the sanctity of Mary's diary". There's an implicit rule which says "don't read someone else's diary."
